entry.name: normalizer
entry.title: normalizer
entry.desc: Prepares/transforms the elements value for validation.
entry.longdesc:
Note that this method:
Doesn't change the elements' value, it only changes the value used for validation.
Gets the value passed as argument, and "this" within it references the corresponding DOMElement.
Needs to return a String value, otherwise it will throw a TypeError exception.

example.desc: Makes "field" required and use a normalizer to trim its value before validating
Makes "url" required and use a normalizer to append 'http://', if not present, to the value of the "url" element before validating
